text: Perdicula is a genus of quail which contains the following four species: * Jungle bush quail, (Perdicula asiatica) * Rock bush quail, (Perdicula argoondah) * Painted bush quail, (Perdicula erythrorhyncha) * Manipur bush quail, (Perdicula manipurensis) ==References== Category:Bird genera
title: Perdicula
